name: Happy Night
summary:
Happy Night is a single player experience set in the Postal 2 Universe featuring a unique dismemberment system and wonderful Christmas story. The story takes place at a early date (31 December 1994) & location before the events of Postal 2. Dude need find way to celebrate this Christmas and do not lost place to stay.
Will Dude survive the night? Will he be able to save all that is expensive for him?
